SEARCH
Package com.samuel.gymtracker.model

Class ExerciseCatalog

java.lang.Object
com.samuel.gymtracker.model.ExerciseCatalog
public final class ExerciseCatalog extends Object
catalog of exercises + built in and user custom made exercises loading/saving from JSON, lookup by name, duplication detection allows lookup and management of Exercise instances by name
